output_list.impact: Integer overflow in mint function causes financial loss and potential reputation damage.
The transferFrom function allows unauthorized users to access other users' funds.
The approve function allows unauthorized users to change the owner's permissions.
The burn function has an integer overflow, allowing unauthorized users to gain access to the contract's funds.
The unfreeze function allows unauthorized users to change the owner's permissions.
The transfer function has an access control issue, allowing unauthorized users to access other users' funds.
